LABEL.UPDATE_INTRODUCTION_TEXT: You password has expired, please update using the below requirements.
LABEL.TIP: Your password length must be at least {{minPassLength}} characters long{{included_details}} and must not contain spaces or emoji.

ERROR.PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password length must be at least {{minPassLength}} characters long

DIALOG.FAIL: Time allowed to complete the password reset has expired. Please contact customer support for assistance or submit a request for another password reset link.
DIALOG.UPDATE_FAIL: There was a problem updating the password. Please contact customer support for assistance or try again.
DIALOG.WEAK_PASSWORD: Provided password is not strong enough, such as by containing dictionary words or being a common password. Please specify a new password.
DIALOG.INCOMPLETE_LINK: The link used to access this page is incomplete. Please try again by clicking on the link provided in the password reset email. If you continue seeing this error, please contact our customer support team.

DEBIT_DIALOG.SETUP_AUTOMATED_PAYMENT: Setup direct debit (automated payment) on the account?
DEBIT_DIALOG.UPDATE_AUTOMATED_PAYMENT: Update currenct direct debit (automated payment) on the account?
DEBIT_DIALOG.REMOVE: Remove, I will pay by due date
DEBIT_DIALOG.LOADING_PAYFRAME: Creating secure area for credit card entry ... please wait.
CONFIRM_REMOVE: direct debit details are to be removed from the account and I will pay bills when thay fall due.
DEBIT_DIALOG.ALSO_APPLY: Apply the direct debit (automated payment) change to all {{count}} accounts you have access to?
DEBIT_DIALOG.YES_APPLY: Yes, apply the change to all {{count}} accounts
DEBIT_DIALOG.NO_APPLY: No, only apply the above change to the current account
DEBIT_DIALOG.ALSO_REMOVE: Also remove any direct debit (automated payment) on all {{count}} accounts you have access to?
DEBIT_DIALOG.YES_REMOVE: Yes, remove any direct debit specified on all {{count}} accounts
DEBIT_DIALOG.NO_REMOVE: No, only remove the direct debit from the current account

LIFE_SUPPORT_DIALOG.TITLE: Life Support
LIFE_SUPPORT_DIALOG.TEXT_INTRO:
If you or a member of your household depend on electricity for life support equipment, you need to let us know. You can let us know by registering your device below.

Once we have registered you for life support, we will advise your local energy distributor and send you a medical confirmation form and practical advice on what to do in the event of a power failure or interruption (planned or unplanned).

You will need to complete the Medical Confirmation Form, have your medical practitioner sign it and then return it to us.

Is anyone at this property depends on electricity for life support equipment?
LIFE_SUPPORT_DIALOG.SELECT_EQUIPMENT: Please select one or more life support devices in-use:
LIFE_SUPPORT_DIALOG.LOADING: Updating life support details ... please wait

ERROR_LABEL.INSTALLED_EQUIPMENT_OTHER: Specify the name of the equipment

LABEL.LAST_INVOICE_BALANCE_TOOLTIP: Amount that was shown on the last invoice that was issued.
LABEL.SINCE_LAST_INVOICE_TOOLTIP: Amount (charges, credits, payments and refunds) applied to the account after the last invoice was issued.
LABEL.CURRENT_ACCOUNT_BALANCE_TOOLTIP: Total amount owing on the account currently.
LABEL.TOTAL_OVERDUE_TOOLTIP: Amount remains unpaid after it was due as at today.
